physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Progressive erythematous nodules on bilateral or unilateral lower extremities, significant pitting edema present in both legs, multiple dome-shaped tumor nodules coalescing into large masses on the left shin and foot, and palpable draining lymph nodes in the inguinal region.
Edema, pruritus, and purple discoloration on the lower aspects of both legs, with numerous violaceous papules.
Ulcerated red nodules on the stump of a left below-the-knee amputation, dome-shaped, erythematous nodules coalescing on the distal stump.
